posts.title: Email/Password Signin
posts.contents:
Moo.do now supports email/password signin in addition to signing in with Google.

In the “Moo.do Account” section of the Settings, you can manage which signin methods are linked to your account. New users can create an account with either email/password or Google. And for those of you who already signed in with Google, you can now:

  1. Link an email/password and sign in with either one
  2. Link email/password and then unlink from Google to just use email/password signin
  3. If you have email/password linked, you can unlink from Google and relink to easily change which Google account your Moo.do account is tied to (a common need when changing jobs)
  4. Ignore this and stick with Google signin

Note: This is just a change to signin. Plugin authentication is not changed.

Up next

We’re working on upgrading the date entry popup in the mobile app, to sync with Google Calendar and set times more easily.
